casebody.data:
SEGURO-SUAREZ
v.
KEY RISK INSURANCE COMPANY, et al. 343P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 12, 2019 Mel J. Garofalo, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Key Risk Insurance Company, et al. C. Rob Wilson, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Key Risk Insurance Company, et al. M. Duane Jones, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Key Risk Insurance Company, et al. David F. Kirby, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Seguro-Suarez, Mario. William B. Bystrynski, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Seguro-Suarez, Mario. David S. Coats, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Hill, Robert E., et al. Linda H. Stephens, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Key Risk Insurance Company, et al The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of June 2019 by Defendants (Key Risk Insurance Company, Joseph J. Abriola, Sharon Sosebee, Suzanne McAuliffe, and Cheryl Gless) to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 12th of July 2019." Davis, J. recused
